page.title: 14BIRDS
page.content: Birds come to{Sanday}in their thousands,either to breed or as a stop on their migratory flights to warmer southern countries. Most are seabirds,the most common of which is the{Fulmar}.The main breeding colony is the{Holms}of{Ire}(page 12) which because of it's isolation is an ideal location for nesting upon.The {Arctic Tern}nests here from{May}to {August}and then flies to{Antarctica. There are local names for almost every bird of{Orkney}.Here is a selection:_ Oystercatcher { _ }Chaldro Arctic Tern { _ }Pickie Common Gull { _ }Whitemaa Eider Duck {_ }Dunter Curlew {_ }Whap Shag {_ }Scarf Lapwing {_ }Teo Fulmar {_ }Mallimack Sky Lark {_ }Laverok
